title: Mumble overlay crashes WoW on OS X
body:
pauldy reports on IRC that the OS X Mumble overlay can crash World of Warcraft (32 bit and 64 bit) when you attempt to resize the WoW window.

Crash logs will follow.


*This ticket has been migrated from sourceforge. It is thus missing some details like original creator etc.
The original is at https://sourceforge.net/p/mumble/bugs/986/ .
